channel.title: What programs i need for Java
channel.description:
hi i want to start learning java and i was wondering what basic software i need, it does not matter if its pay software ill get it anyways
thanks for your help

item.title: What programs i need for Java
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

-Chaos-:

where my java.exe is or my javac?

Alright dude… did you read the tutorial Exception pointed out?
If not, read this: tut

After you read that, come back to this thread and then ask how to start programming in Java.

@-Chaos-'s edit:
Dude, you should be able to do “java classFileName”. If not, then you need to read the tutorial in the above link.

Read full topic

item.source: What programs i need for Java

item.title: What programs i need for Java
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

Exception:

then type javac myfile.java.

what he means is menu>run>cmd
type

cd "C:/user/docs and settings/desktop/folder"

make sure you actually type where you java file is at…
then type

javac file.java

or *.java for all java files to be compiled…

it is a lot less complicated if you take this:

@echo off
java *.java
pause

and put it in “run.bat”

then u can run in the directory your java files are in, that way, you can just always have that… its faster

Read full topic

item.source: What programs i need for Java

item.title: What programs i need for Java
item.dc:creator: @Exception Exception
item.description:
@Exception wrote:

First off, you don’t click on java.exe, and you don’t need to use the JConsole if you want to learn Java. Set up your environmental variables (http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,70709.0.html), then type javac myfile.java.

Read full topic
item.source: What programs i need for Java

item.title: What programs i need for Java
item.dc:creator: @Chaos -Chaos-
item.description:
@Chaos wrote:

whenever i click on Java.exe a Cmd prompt screen comes up and then dissapears right away

this is the JConsole could i possibly use this and how do i fill in those blanks if i have to

Read full topic
item.source: What programs i need for Java

item.title: What programs i need for Java
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

in the jdk : (Windows)
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk6.0_03\bin\javac.exe - compiler
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk6.0_03\bin\java.exe - virtual machine
in the jre : (Windows)
C:\Program Files\Java\jre6.0_03\bin\java.exe - virtual machine

those are it dont know if the “jre6.0_03” and “jdk6.0_03” parts is acurate

and yes all u basicly need is the jdk sence it brings a compiler and the virtual machine

Read full topic
item.source: What programs i need for Java

item.title: What programs i need for Java
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

You’ll need a fully functional computer and all related components, access to internet service, a bit of common sense, and, last but certainly not least, a brain.
